video.title: Departures
video.synopsis: This travel series follows friends Scott Wilson and Justin Lukach around the world, chronicling their adventures and the challenges they encounter.

episodes.synopsis: Before setting out on their global trek, friends Scott and Justin decide to check out their native Canada first on a cross-country drive.
episodes.title: Canada: Ocean to Ocean

episodes.synopsis: In the days before their friend Ibrahim's wedding, Scott and Justin camp out with desert-dwelling Bedouins and visit famed sites Petra and Aqaba.
episodes.title: Jordan

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin's friend Monica joins them on a desert-bound Indian train. Later, they see how average Indians live and join the Diwali festivities.
episodes.title: India: Sacred Ground

episodes.synopsis: The world's highest mountaintops, a massive storm and food poisoning greet Scott and Justin as they head off the beaten path in India.
episodes.title: India: Quest for Himalayas

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin try to manage financial and personal matters from atop the highest mountain peak in the South Atlantic.
episodes.title: Ascension Island

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin tackle the massive network of Japanese trains and face language and food challenges before leaving the city for the countryside.
episodes.title: Japan: The Future

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin travel by ferry to the island of Miyajima for a night in the Japanese wilderness -- and share a campsite with hundreds of deer.
episodes.title: Japan: The Past

episodes.synopsis: In the Cook Islands, Scott begins to have doubts about spending a year traveling, while Justin learns some local lessons about living off the land.
episodes.title: Cook Islands

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas nears, Scott and Justin explore the unspoiled wilds of New Zealand and reflect on friends and family waiting for them back home.
episodes.title: New Zealand: Untouched

episodes.synopsis: Jumping into adventure with their friend Ellis brings out Justin's thrill-seeking side and Scott's aversion to risk.
episodes.title: New Zealand: Adrenaline

episodes.synopsis: Justin and Scott leave the beaten path in Thailand and find amazing sights, from villages in the northern hill country to open-air kickboxing.
episodes.title: Thailand

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin's friend Sarorn and his family take them to the poverty-stricken villages of Cambodia that the travel brochures don't advertise.
episodes.title: Cambodia

episodes.synopsis: Back home after a year of globe-trotting, Scott and Justin still long to travel and set out for far-flung areas of their native Canada.
episodes.title: Canada: Pushing North

episodes.synopsis: A reunion in Spain leads to capers in Gibraltar, a ferry to Morocco, a stay at a kasbah in the snow-covered Atlas Mountains -- and a triumphant climb.
episodes.title: Morocco

episodes.synopsis: In Libya, the guys travel from Tripoli to Jebel Nafusa, get lost in the abandoned city of Ghadames and sandboard the dunes of the Sahara.
episodes.title: Libya

episodes.synopsis: The guys go hang gliding and watch a football match in Rio de Janeiro, then discover dangerous flora and fauna in Pantanal.
episodes.title: Brazil: Piranha Soup

episodes.synopsis: The guys head downriver to the rain forest, encountering perilous creatures and weather to match; scuba diving off an island yields an awesome sight.
episodes.title: Brazil: Treading Water

episodes.synopsis: The guys visit tobacco fields, taste rum, play baseball, take part in a Santeria ceremony and stop at Fidel Castro's hideout on their way to Carnival.
episodes.title: Cuba

episodes.synopsis: Woes at the airport precede a trek on horseback to a nomadic reindeer tribe. The guys take part in the tribe's traditions and learn valuable lessons.
episodes.title: Mongolia: Tribes and Tribulations

episodes.synopsis: The guys say good-bye to the Tsatsaan Reindeer tribe. Heading back, they feast on yak and goat, then visit the Gobi Desert.
episodes.title: Mongolia: Meals and Wheels

episodes.synopsis: The guys find adventure on the ice and glaciers. They help a family herd sheep, try ice climbing and squeeze into a volcanic lava tube.
episodes.title: Iceland

episodes.synopsis: In Zambia, Scott and Justin find themselves in the midst of some of the most wild roads and dangerous animals on the planet.
episodes.title: Zambia

episodes.synopsis: The guys make their way through Madagascar, where they find lemurs, climb the jagged cliffs in Tsingy and befriend a village full of kids.
episodes.title: Madagascar

episodes.synopsis: The guys climb high in the Altiplano, go back in time on the island of Chiloe, and visit active volcanoes, salt flats and pink flamingo reserves.
episodes.title: Chile: Ups and Downs

episodes.synopsis: The guys experience the breathtaking awe of the Easter Island head statues, head to Patagonia to help shear sheep and visit a penguin island.
episodes.title: Chile: Ends of the Earth

episodes.synopsis: Scott and Justin stay in the Chilean scientific base on King George Island, where they spend a week learning about life on Antarctica.
episodes.title: Antarctica
